sentence: Great stay cleanliness in room disappointing for 5 Stayed here between Xmas and new year stayed in a wonderful room which I have to say was great but the cleanliness was a let down
The views from the pool are fantastic looking out to the ocean and also the Infinity Pool is nice to chill by if you get up early
We recently stayed at W Barcelona family of 5 with 2 rooms and we LOVED this hotel
The room was a Fabulous Room which summed it up
The bed Heavenly as well and room décor works for the hotel environment
Best views in Barcelona
Super view from hotel
Situated at the far end of the beach the hotel looks outstanding against the backdrop of the long stretch of beach in front of it especially with its mirrored full length bay windows
It is a landmark and an important part of Barcelonas skyline
To be honest I love the location of this hotel perhaps more than the hotel itself just by the beach fabulous view
Fitness room has changing room but strangely no showers
We arrived at 2 pm 1 hour before the official check in time of 3 pm and checked in but were told that they were preparing the room and would let us know when it was ready
We showed a member of staff all of the above and he said he would get us a new room not seen him since
Modern and upbeat but disappointing room cleaning and management
Check in and check out a bit challenging due to number of guests and room was n’t ready at 5 pm
It ’s sold as a room with a view expecting to be higher up
We were asked to sit outside on the terrace until opening
The room was very noisy and were people having a party in the middle of the night but instead of asking them to be silent 3 am they made me change the room in the middle of the night

how dare she blame us to be self served while she refused to perform her duty properlyAnd then another occasion we got lost in the Wet deck area while we tried to walk from the infinity pool to the main pool due to there were zero signage about the route
The room a bit old
